'''1.20.73''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on all platforms except Xbox and Nintendo Switch on April 1, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/25513790335245|title=Minecraft - 1.20.73 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=April 1, 2024}}</ref> which fixes a gameplay crash.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash that could occur during gameplay.
